name: Get out of the Woods Demo
name_original: Get out of the Woods Demo
description: This is a first person point and click, image based windows game. Travel through the lands, find the pieces of the coins and assemble them. First person per coin, gets the reward; if you can decipher the private key. See www.bassmentgames.com for full details. Demo is full size game, but restricted to first few minutes of game play. Try the free demo and see if the game is for you.
